metadata.name: Sistine Madonna
metadata.description:
1/1 digital art.

A painting by Italian painter Raphael Santi in my reading for Tony's House. This is my reading of legendary art in the modern world. 
Art has no expiration date; it is always current, modern, and timeless. The world changes daily and we change along with it, but in spite of that, art stays with us invariably. 
Artists used to look for pigment for their paints, but now they look for new marketplaces to place their NFTs. And this in no way negates the creative part of the process. 
We cannot eradicate the love of beauty.

6000*9000 pixels, 500 dpi
